'''Erroll''' is a patient who came into the station 19 clinic.

==History==
Erroll came into the clinic and said it was getting harder and hard to walk. Travis removed his sock and two of his toes fell onto the ground. Travis asked him if he was diabetic and he said he didn't know for sure, but didn't think so. He noticed his toes changing, but thought it was just bad circulation. Ben examined him and diagnosed diabetic neuropathy and foot disease, which he also saw in Erroll's other foot. Maya pricked his finger to check his blood sugar. They told him he needed to get to Grey Sloan immediately for care. He tried to object, becuase he didn't have insurance and didn't want to lose his house, but Travis promised to help him figure it out. When he found out he'd have to go by ambulance, he worried even more about the cost. He then said he'd noticed that his feet were numb for a few weeks, but it never seemed urgent enough to go into debt.

==Career==
He worked collecting tolls until the city automated the whole process.
